attributes.action: Withdraw the resettlement allowance for MPs who are either deselected by their party or who choose to leave before being pushed out over their expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs receive a generous allowance to ease them back into normal society when they cease to be MPs. Any MP who has essentially been sacked does not deserve payment for failure.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
